entry.title: Fragmentary Texts – OCR from the The Leipzig Open Fragmentary Texts Series (LOFTS)
entry.content:
Fragmentary Texts – OCR from the The Leipzig Open Fragmentary Texts Series (LOFTS) 
In this page we present a list of OCR outputs of collections of Greek fragmentary authors produced by Bruce Robertson for the Lace: Greek OCR project:
  • Aristotle et al. (1863). Valentini Rose Aristoteles pseudepigraphus
  • Arnim, Hans Friedrich August von, 1859-1931 et al. (1964). Stoicorum veterum fragmenta 1
  • Arnim, Hans Friedrich August von, 1859-1931 et al. (1964). Stoicorum veterum fragmenta 2
  • Arnim, Hans Friedrich August von, 1859-1931 et al. (1964). Stoicorum veterum fragmenta 3
  • Caecilius, Calactinus et al. (1907). Caecilii Calactini fragmenta collegit Ernestvs Ofenloch
  • Didymus, Moritz Schmidt (1854). Didymi Chalcenteri grammatici alexandrini fragmenta quae supersunt omnia
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922 (1912). Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker, griechisch und deutsch 1
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922 (1912). Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker, griechisch und deutsch 2
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922 (1912). Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker, griechisch und deutsch 2, ha.2
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922 (1922). Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker, griechisch und deutsch 3
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922, ed (1901). Poetarvm philosophorvm fragmenta
  • Diels, Hermann, 1848-1922 (1890). Sibyllinische Blätter
  • Diogenes (1907). Diogenis Oenoandensis Fragmenta
  • Diogenes, of Oenoanda et al. (1907). Fragmenta. Ordinavit et explicavit Iohannes William
  • Dionysius, Aelius et al. (1890). Ailiou Dionysiou kai Pausaniou onomata Attika. Aelii Dionysii et Pausaniae Atticistarum fragmenta; collegit Ernestus Schwabe
  • Gottfried Kinkel (1877). Epicorum graecorum fragmenta
  • Grenfell, Bernard P. (Bernard Pyne), 1869-1926 et al. (1909). Hellenica oxyrhynchia cum Theopompi et Cratippi fragmentis recognoverunt brevique adnotatione critica
  • Hunt, Arthur S. (Arthur Surridge), 1871-1934 (1912). Tragicorum graecorum fragmenta papyracea nuper reperta
  • Kinkel, Gottfried, 1844-1891 (1877). Epicorum graecorum fragmenta : vol. 1
  • Kock, Theodor, 1820-1901 (1880-88). Comicorum atticorum fragmenta 1
  • Kock, Theodor, 1820-1901 (1880-88). Comicorum atticorum fragmenta 2
  • Kock, Theodor, 1820-1901 (1880-88). Comicorum atticorum fragmenta 3
  • Meineke, August, 1790-1870 (1839). Fragmenta comicorum graecorum 3
  • Metrodorus, of Lampsacus, d. 277 B.C et al. (1890). Metrodori Epicurei Fragmenta collegit scriptoris incerti Epicurei Commentarium moralem, subiecit Alfredus Koerte
  • Nauck, August, 1822-1892 (1889). Tragicorum graecorum fragmenta
  • Orpheus et al. (1922). Orphicorum fragmenta, collegit Otto Kern
  • Philo, of Alexandria et al. (1886). Fragments; newly edited by Rendel Harris
  • Phylarchus (1836). Historiarum fragmenta
  • Theodorus Kock (1880). Comicorum atticorum fragmenta
For a complete catalog of OCR outputs of more than 600 Greek texts, see Lace: Greek OCR – Texts.
